attributes.action: Bring forward a general election to allow a vote of no confidence
attributes.additional_details: The current government is incapable of leading this country through this pandemic and also deal with issues such as cancer, child poverty, mental health and other strong issues that the general public need support with. They are ignoring the voice of the people and are now dictating us in a free country. Let's get this changed before we lose our democracy.
attributes.background: Allow the public to go to the polls and show our frustration and disappointment in our current government and allow a party who has the publics best interest to take the lead in Parliament
